page.title: 03Dovercourt Swimming pool
page.content: {In 1984 Dovercourt's first indoor {swimming pool}was built by the local council. It is adjacent to the sea and cost Â£300,000 to build. It is constructed on a raised platform to give easy access for repairs and maintenance. It opened in Nov 1984. Schools use the pool during term time. The pool has recently started a swimming club to encourage young people to improve their swimming techniques and to gain lenth and grade badges. They also run a club competition and are planning to have a club gala. They offer preliminary sub_aqua diving training. The disabled can use the pool on Saturday mornings. The pool is a popular recreational facility.The manager is waiting to see how many holidaymakers will use it in its first summer.
